arts.ttl: Augsburg and Hoffenheim battle to goalless draw in tense Bundesliga encounter
arts.sum: Both teams created numerous chances, but failed to score in what was a very evenly matched Bundesliga encounter. Augsburg's Chrislain Matsima came close with a header that went just wide in the 81st minute, while Hoffenheim's Tabaković saw his powerful shot saved by Labrović.

arts.ttl: Nothing to split Augsburg and Hoffenheim after scoreless stalemate
arts.sum: Jess Thorup's side played host to Hoffenheim to kick-start Sunday's Bundesliga fixtures. In the end, neither side managed to break the deadlock as it finished 0-0.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Hoffenheim preview: Guests hoping to exit relegation zone
arts.sum: Pellegrino Matarazzo's TSG 1899 Hoffenheim seek to shake off a poor run-of-form in the league and pull themselves out of the relegation zone in a Sunday trip to the WWK Arena. Historically, Hoffenheim have achieved more against Augsburg than any other current top tier side. Current trends nevertheless render such success moot. A preview, inclusive predicted lineups, lies below.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: It's another weekend of top-class action across Europe before the final international break of the year and Jamie Griffith has looked through the major leagues to form a five-team acca.
